members.name: isAvailable
members.description: Checks whether to device is capable of printing.

members.name: check
members.description: Checks if the printer service is available (iOS) or if printer services are installed and enabled (Android).

members.name: pick
members.description: Displays a system interface allowing the user to select an available printer. To speak with a printer directly you need to know the network address by picking them before via `printer.pick`.

params.name: content
params.description: The content to print. Can be a URL or an HTML string. If a HTML DOM Object is provided, its innerHtml property value will be used.

params.name: options
params.description: optional. The options to pass to the printer
